Package game

Class ConsoleGame

java.lang.Object
game.Game
game.ConsoleGame
public class ConsoleGame
extends Game
Game sub class - acts as game environment. Built on a pseudo singleton structure, handles the creation of each other singleton within the simulator. Acts as implementation for specific i/o e.g. console
Author:
Alex Burling(arb142), Jonathon Howe(joh29)
See Also:
Game

  • Method Details

    • runDay

      public void runDay()
      runDay serves as the code inside the main game loop.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Prints the end game string to the console. String in the form "You ended the game with {points} points." points is the returned value from the getScore method.

    • displayHelp

      public void displayHelp()
      Prints a string displaying all available commands to System.out
